ä¸ºæ–¹ä¾¿æŸ¥çœ‹æ‘˜å½•ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š

###CentOS/RHEL 7.x:###

yum install epel-release
rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm

###CentOS/RHEL 6.x:###

yum install epel-release
rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el6/latest.rpm

Now you can install PHP 7.1â€™s mod_php SAPI (along with an opcode cache) by doing:

yum install mod_php71w php71w-opcache

You can alternatively install PHP 7.1â€™s php-fpm SAPI (along with an opcode cache by doing:

yum install php71w-fpm php71w-opcache

See the package list below for additional SAPIs and PHP extensions.
